slogans.growing_3: Amidst the trees, we find our roots and grow towards the sky.
slogans.growing_4: The forest whispers secrets of ancient wisdom and timeless beauty.
slogans.growing_5: In the heart of the forest, we discover the essence of life itself.

full_grown.slogan: Congratulations! Your tree is fully grown.

withered.slogan: Oh no! You'll do better next time.
